declare @q nvarchar(4000), @d smalldatetime, @d2 smalldatetime, @h char(5), @stt_rec char(13), @unitKey nvarchar(4000), @siteKey nvarchar(4000), @key nvarchar(4000), @h_line1 as nvarchar(128), @h_line2 as nvarchar(128), @h_line3 as nvarchar(128), @h_line4 as nvarchar(128)
select @h_line1 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC097' select @h_line2 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC098' select @h_line3 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC099' select @h_line4 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC100' select @d = ngay_ct, @d2 = ngay_lct, @h = tg_kk, @stt_rec = replace(stt_rec, '''', '') from kkyc with(nolock) where so_ct = @$so_ct
select top 0 identity(int, 1, 1) as stt, a.ma_vt, a.ma_kho, a.ma_vi_tri, a.ma_lo, b.sl_nhap as ton_hd into #kkkt from kkktdcsl a, wrkin b select top 0 5 as sysorder, cast(0 as int) as stt, a.ma_vt, a.ma_kho, a.ma_vi_tri, a.ma_lo, c.sl_nhap as ton_hd, b.ho_ten, b.chuc_vu, b.dai_dien, b.nhiem_vu into #kq from kkktdcsl a, kkycbkk b, wrkin c select top 0 ma_kho, ma_vi_tri, ma_lo, ma_vt, sl_nhap as so_luong, tien_nhap as tien, tien_nt_n as tien_nt into #t_ss from wrkin
select line_nbr, ho_ten, chuc_vu, dai_dien, nhiem_vu into #bkk from kkycbkk where stt_rec = @stt_rec
select @key = 'a.stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + '''' select @unitKey = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$GetUnitFilter('a.ma_dvcs', '', @@userID, @@admin) exec AI_ERP$System$GetSiteFilter 'a.ma_kho', '', @unitKey, @@userID, @@admin, @siteKey output if @unitKey is not null select @key = @key + ' and ' + replace(@unitKey, 'a.', 'b.') if @siteKey is not null select @key = @key + ' and ' + @siteKey
select @key = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$GetCheckKey(@key)
select @q = 'insert into #kkkt (ma_vt, ma_kho, ma_vi_tri, ma_lo, ton_hd) select a.ma_vt, a.ma_kho, a.ma_vi_tri, a.ma_lo, 0' select @q = @q + ' from kkktdcsl a with(nolock)' if @unitKey is not null select @q = @q + ' left join dmkho b with(nolock) on a.ma_kho = b.ma_kho' select @q = @q + ' where ' + @key + ' order by a.ma_kho, a.ma_vi_tri, a.ma_lo, a.ma_vt' exec sp_executesql @q
exec rs_generatestocktaking @stt_rec, '#t_ss', @@language, @@userID, @@admin
update #kkkt set ton_hd = a.so_luong from #t_ss a where a.ma_kho = #kkkt.ma_kho and a.ma_vt = #kkkt.ma_vt and a.ma_vi_tri = #kkkt.ma_vi_tri and a.ma_lo = #kkkt.ma_lo
select ma_kho, min(stt) as stt into #sx from #kkkt group by ma_kho
if not exists (select 1 from #kkkt) begin insert into #kq (sysorder, ma_kho, ma_vi_tri, ma_lo, ma_vt, ho_ten, chuc_vu, dai_dien, nhiem_vu) select 4, '', '', '', '', ho_ten, chuc_vu, dai_dien, nhiem_vu from #bkk order by line_nbr insert into #kq (sysorder, stt, ma_kho, ma_vi_tri, ma_lo, ma_vt, ton_hd) select 5, 1, '', '', '', '', 0 end else begin insert into #kq (sysorder, ma_kho, ma_vi_tri, ma_lo, ma_vt, ho_ten, chuc_vu, dai_dien, nhiem_vu) select 4, a.ma_kho, '', '', '', max(b.ho_ten), max(b.chuc_vu), max(b.dai_dien), max(b.nhiem_vu) from #kkkt a cross join #bkk b group by a.ma_kho, b.line_nbr order by a.ma_kho, b.line_nbr insert into #kq (sysorder, stt, ma_kho, ma_vi_tri, ma_lo, ma_vt, ton_hd) select 5, a.stt - b.stt + 1, a.ma_kho, a.ma_vi_tri, a.ma_lo, a.ma_vt, a.ton_hd from #kkkt a join #sx b on a.ma_kho = b.ma_kho order by a.ma_kho, a.ma_vi_tri, a.ma_vt, a.ma_lo end
select isnull((select top 1 1 from #bkk), 0) as bkk_yn, replace(left(@h, 2), '00', '0') as gio, replace(right(@h, 2), '00', '') as phut, replace(str(day(@d), 2), ' ', '0') as ngay_kk, replace(str(month(@d), 2), ' ', '0') as thang_kk, cast(year(@d) as char(4)) as nam_kk, @h_line1 as h_line1, @h_line2 as h_line2, @h_line3 as h_line3, @h_line4 as h_line4
select 1 as sysprint, 1 as systotal, a.*, case when @@language = 'V' then ten_vt else ten_vt2 end as ten_vt, b.dvt, case when @@language = 'V' then ten_kho else ten_kho2 end as ten_kho from #kq a left join dmvt b with(nolock) on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt left join dmkho c with(nolock) on a.ma_kho = c.ma_kho order by a.ma_kho, a.sysorder, a.stt
